General.Name: US Critical Metals Corp.
General.Description: US Critical Metals Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of resource properties. It holds an option to acquire 100% interests in Haynes cobalt project that covers a total area of approximately 192 hectares located in the Blackbird Mining District of the Idaho Cobalt Belt in Idaho; and the Clayton Ridge lithium project, which covers a total area of approximately 712.25 hectares located in Esmeralda County, Nevada. The company is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 550 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2B5
